proposal:
idea_implementation: Create or update the file generated_2.js with this complete content:

(Note: Assets are not separately detailed from expenses and other outflow transactions as they would cancel each other in the absence of a profit situation or additional information.)

**Income Statement for Partnership (for Year-End)**
Revenue                 | Expenses       | Net Income  
------------------------------|-------------------|---------------------   
Total revenue: $210,786               | Rent + Utilities  -$35,495              | Gross profit (revenue minus expenses): $175,291      
Less Cost of Goods Sold   $-119.9k                      | Interest Expense          -$4,000   
Gross Profit:               $160,300.1         | Salary and wages             -$85,000    
Less Operating Losses/Income (as detailed in the cash flow statement)                          = $-24,709.9  
Add Interest Income:        $6k              | Rent Expense               +$13,138   
Earnings Before Tax & Dividends      $51,439 
Less Partner A's Share (based on equity account balances and ownership stake): -$27,059.6  
Net Income:                          $-862,474

This is for opportunity: Custom API Development
Make sure the file is complete, working, and production-ready.
risks: Slow failure: unnoticed degradation accumulating by 2028-01-01
Unintended consequence: incentives shift toward short-term metrics, long-term reliability decays
Incentive drift: stakeholders habituate to optimistic outputs, raising risk of silent defects
mitigations: Add scheduled adversarial audits with hard pass/fail gates
Track leading indicators for drift and trust inflation; alert on trend change
Prefer reversible rollouts; keep rollback artifacts warm and tested
